Desc.entry: An independent, registered charity which provides training, employment support, leisure activities and holidays for people with learning disabilities. Courses include: gardening, basic skills, online courses, computers, cooking, pre-employment, enterprise development, empowerment, relationships, creative writing, Spanish, sing language, drumming lessons, drama and dance, and hair and beauty. Also holds regular drop-in sessions, sensory room sessions and holiday activities for people at college during term-time. Company limted by guarantee no 06504047

category.entry: LEARNING DISABILITIES - ORGANISATIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH
